attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: one night, I was sitting on my couch, watching my favorite episode of micky mouse, when I decided to download this so I thought wonderful app, where I could support our lord and savior Jesus Trump. After about 6 months, the app finally downloaded. I was so excited to see what this app was all about! So I opened it and was shocked to see that I was greeted with very loud music coming from the app. I turned off my phone and went to go to sleep. When all of a sudden.... I see a very orange 🍊Oompa Loompa staring at me through my window! Of course I was very frightened, for I have a terrible fear of tiny orange men who think they know everything about everything. So I knew what I had to do. I ran into my attic where I kept my kids that I had kidnapped. I only had one little window in my attic for I did not want my children to see the outside world. Anyways, there’s no way 🍊 👨 would ever be able to get up and through that little 2cm window, right.... well I thought wrong. The next thing I knew, he was climbing through the window! Some how he made it though.. I don’t know how, but he did! And you know who he brought along with him? His man-looking wife. Milano Trump. I sacrificed the nine-and-a-half children I had to mr dump. He then proceeded to scream in my face, “RATE TRUMPY TRUMPY APP 5 STARS!” But I wasn’t taking this nonsense, so I PROCEEDED TO RENEGADE IN HIS FACE. Now obviously he wasn’t to happy about that because he wants tiktok BANNED FROM THE UNITED STATES! I wouldn’t have it! No, for I would STOP THIS FROM HAPPENING. So I continued to renegade, and savage, and say-so in his face until finally, mr rump shrunk into a miniature size. I then picked him up, and threw him out the window. I did the same with his man-wife. I will forever be traumatized. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT THE SAME THING TO HAPPEN TOO.
